title: Kids' Picks: Bugs Bunny
brief_description: A series of children’s classic cartoons featuring Felix the Cat in “The Goose that laid the golden egg”, Bugs Bunny in “Falling Hare”, “Waikiki Wabbit”, “Presto-Change-o”, “The Timid Torredor” and Porky Pig & Daffy Duck in “Baby Bottleneck” and “Have you got any castles”
